resources.string: Ako si Jaymark D. Asis, 21 taong gulang. Nakatira sa 2564-C Alabastro Street San Andress bukid, Manila. Isa akong estudyante sa Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Maynila na kinukuha ang kursong Batsilyer ng Agham ng Teknolohiya ng Impormasyon. Isa akong gangster ngunit ako ay takot sa isang nilalang, nangangalang Jacob Barcelona sapagkat kaya niya akong barilin sa sarili kong mukha.

Grilling involves cooking food on a rack over a heat source, usually a charcoal fire or ceramic briquettes heated by gas flames. Direct heat quickly sears the outside of food, producing distinctive robust, roasted―and sometimes pleasantly charred―flavors and a nice crust.

A dessert is a type of food that is eaten after lunch or dinner, and sometimes after a light meal or snack. It is usually a sweet food, like ice cream, cookies, and cakes. In some countries, cheeses such as Brie cheese and fruit are served as dessert. Some desserts are decorated, like birthday cakes.

Italian cuisine is a Mediterranean cuisine consisting of the ingredients, recipes and cooking techniques developed across the Italian Peninsula since antiquity, and later spread around the world together with waves of Italian diaspora

A milkshake (sometimes called a shake in the United States) is a sweet drink made by blending milk, ice cream, and flavorings or sweeteners such as butterscotch, caramel sauce, chocolate syrup, fruit syrup, or whole fruit into a thick, sweet, cold mixture.
